description technical detail:
ViewSonic CDP4235-T (42 inch) Full HD Commercial LCD Display
ViewSonics CDP4235-T Full HD touch commercial display features a 1920 x 1080p panel with 4000:1 contrast and Intels Open Pluggable Specification (OPS) for applications requiring an integrated media player. Additional features include versatile inputs - HDMI, DVI, VGA, S-Video and composite, YPbPr and built in 10 W x 2 speakers. The CDP4235-T will support up to a 5 x 5 display video wall with internal clock and scheduler. RS-232 daisy chain capable and RJ45 are provided for remote control.
dimensions weight details: Panel without stand - 99.16 cm x 11.55 cm x 64.8 cm x 23 kg Â¦ Panel with stand - 99.16 cm x 32.88 cm x 62.1 cm
service support details: Limited warranty - parts and labour - 3 years Â¦ Limited warranty - backlight - 3 years
